EmailTemplate.name: Current Trial: January 2016.Day 06
EmailTemplate.subject: Need some help? Check out Bigcommerce University!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Watch our quick videos hosted by ecommerce consultants to become an online selling expert Become an online selling expert at Bigcommerce University Each of our quick videos is hosted by ecommerce experts Katey and James, and covers need-to-know topics like how to launch your store, attract shoppers, improve website conversion and build customer loyalty. Start with "A Quick Tour of Your Bigcommerce Control Panel." Watch our short videos <[[https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/University/Quick-Tour-of-Bigcommerce-Video]]> Speak with one of our ecommerce experts today at 1-866-949-5336 <[[tel:+18669495336]]>.
